comment: Better every time. Heavy on the heat with oak, earth, leather, moss, and vanilla. A goddamn steal. Toss in an ice chip and you get more tobacco and leather along with cinnamon and red wine. Long finish that ends dry. In a good way. Like sunshine after a flood.

Really good, spicy but not overwhelming. Longest finish I've tasted as of 4/17/17. Very complex

Capital cellars $170

Tasted 4/8/17 Capital Cellars, Frankfort, KY
Very good, but price was an issue @ $40 for taste & $170/bottle
